26 #ifndef REACTPHYSICS3D_VECTOR3_H
27 #define REACTPHYSICS3D_VECTOR3_H
28 
29 // Libraries
30 #include <cassert>
31 #include <cmath>
32 #include <algorithm>
33 #include <reactphysics3d/decimal.h>
34 #include <reactphysics3d/mathematics/mathematics_common.h>
35 #include <reactphysics3d/configuration.h>
36 
38 namespace reactphysics3d {
39 
40 // Struct Vector3
44 struct Vector3 {
45 
46  public:
47 
48  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
49 
51  decimal x;
52 
54  decimal y;
55 
57  decimal z;
58 
59  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
60 
62  Vector3();
63 
65  Vector3(decimal newX, decimal newY, decimal newZ);
66 
68  void setAllValues(decimal newX, decimal newY, decimal newZ);
69 
71  void setToZero();
72 
74  decimal length() const;
75 
77  decimal lengthSquare() const;
78 
80  Vector3 getUnit() const;
81 
83  Vector3 getOneUnitOrthogonalVector() const;
84 
86  bool isUnit() const;
87 
89  bool isFinite() const;
90 
92  bool isZero() const;
93 
95  decimal dot(const Vector3& vector) const;
96 
98  Vector3 cross(const Vector3& vector) const;
99 
101  void normalize();
102 
104  Vector3 getAbsoluteVector() const;
105 
107  int getMinAxis() const;
108 
110  int getMaxAxis() const;
111 
113  decimal getMinValue() const;
114 
116  decimal getMaxValue() const;
117 
119  bool operator== (const Vector3& vector) const;
120 
122  bool operator!= (const Vector3& vector) const;
123 
125  Vector3& operator+=(const Vector3& vector);
126 
128  Vector3& operator-=(const Vector3& vector);
129 
131  Vector3& operator*=(decimal number);
132 
134  Vector3& operator/=(decimal number);
135 
137  decimal& operator[] (int index);
138 
140  const decimal& operator[] (int index) const;
141 
143  bool operator<(const Vector3& vector) const;
144 
146  std::string to_string() const;
147 
149  static Vector3 min(const Vector3& vector1, const Vector3& vector2);
150 
152  static Vector3 max(const Vector3& vector1, const Vector3& vector2);
153 
155  static Vector3 zero();
156 
157  // -------------------- Friends -------------------- //
158 
159  friend Vector3 operator+(const Vector3& vector1, const Vector3& vector2);
160  friend Vector3 operator-(const Vector3& vector1, const Vector3& vector2);
161  friend Vector3 operator-(const Vector3& vector);
162  friend Vector3 operator*(const Vector3& vector, decimal number);
163  friend Vector3 operator*(decimal number, const Vector3& vector);
164  friend Vector3 operator*(const Vector3& vector1, const Vector3& vector2);
165  friend Vector3 operator/(const Vector3& vector, decimal number);
166  friend Vector3 operator/(const Vector3& vector1, const Vector3& vector2);
167 };
168 
169 // Constructor of the struct Vector3
170 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3::Vector3() : x(0.0), y(0.0), z(0.0) {
171 
172 }
173 
174 // Constructor with arguments
175 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3::Vector3(decimal newX, decimal newY, decimal newZ) : x(newX), y(newY), z(newZ) {
176 
177 }
178 
179 // Set the vector to zero
180 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void Vector3::setToZero() {
181  x = 0;
182  y = 0;
183  z = 0;
184 }
185 
186 // Set all the values of the vector
187 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void Vector3::setAllValues(decimal newX, decimal newY, decimal newZ) {
188  x = newX;
189  y = newY;
190  z = newZ;
191 }
192 
193 // Return the length of the vector
194 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal Vector3::length() const {
195  return std::sqrt(x*x + y*y + z*z);
196 }
197 
198 // Return the square of the length of the vector
199 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal Vector3::lengthSquare() const {
200  return x*x + y*y + z*z;
201 }
202 
203 // Scalar product of two vectors (RP3D_FORCE_INLINE)
204 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal Vector3::dot(const Vector3& vector) const {
205  return (x*vector.x + y*vector.y + z*vector.z);
206 }
207 
208 // Cross product of two vectors (RP3D_FORCE_INLINE)
209 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 Vector3::cross(const Vector3& vector) const {
210  return Vector3(y * vector.z - z * vector.y,
211  z * vector.x - x * vector.z,
212  x * vector.y - y * vector.x);
213 }
214 
215 // Normalize the vector
216 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void Vector3::normalize() {
217  decimal l = length();
218  if (l < MACHINE_EPSILON) {
219  return;
220  }
221  x /= l;
222  y /= l;
223  z /= l;
224 }
225 
226 // Return the corresponding absolute value vector
227 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 Vector3::getAbsoluteVector() const {
228  return Vector3(std::abs(x), std::abs(y), std::abs(z));
229 }
230 
231 // Return the axis with the minimal value
232 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE int Vector3::getMinAxis() const {
233  return (x < y ? (x < z ? 0 : 2) : (y < z ? 1 : 2));
234 }
235 
236 // Return the axis with the maximal value
237 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE int Vector3::getMaxAxis() const {
238  return (x < y ? (y < z ? 2 : 1) : (x < z ? 2 : 0));
239 }
240 
241 // Return true if the vector is unit and false otherwise
242 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool Vector3::isUnit() const {
243  return reactphysics3d::approxEqual(lengthSquare(), decimal(1.0));
244 }
245 
246 // Return true if the values are not NAN OR INF
247 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool Vector3::isFinite() const {
248  return std::isfinite(x) && std::isfinite(y) && std::isfinite(z);
249 }
250 
251 // Return true if the vector is the zero vector
252 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool Vector3::isZero() const {
253  return reactphysics3d::approxEqual(lengthSquare(), decimal(0.0));
254 }
255 
256 // Overloaded operator for the equality condition
257 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool Vector3::operator== (const Vector3& vector) const {
258  return (x == vector.x && y == vector.y && z == vector.z);
259 }
260 
261 // Overloaded operator for the is different condition
262 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool Vector3::operator!= (const Vector3& vector) const {
263  return !(*this == vector);
264 }
265 
266 // Overloaded operator for addition with assignment
267 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3& Vector3::operator+=(const Vector3& vector) {
268  x += vector.x;
269  y += vector.y;
270  z += vector.z;
271  return *this;
272 }
273 
274 // Overloaded operator for substraction with assignment
275 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3& Vector3::operator-=(const Vector3& vector) {
276  x -= vector.x;
277  y -= vector.y;
278  z -= vector.z;
279  return *this;
280 }
281 
282 // Overloaded operator for multiplication with a number with assignment
283 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3& Vector3::operator*=(decimal number) {
284  x *= number;
285  y *= number;
286  z *= number;
287  return *this;
288 }
289 
290 // Overloaded operator for division by a number with assignment
291 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3& Vector3::operator/=(decimal number) {
292  assert(number > std::numeric_limits<decimal>::epsilon());
293  x /= number;
294  y /= number;
295  z /= number;
296  return *this;
297 }
298 
299 // Overloaded operator for value access
300 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal& Vector3::operator[] (int index) {
301  return (&x)[index];
302 }
303 
304 // Overloaded operator for value access
305 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const decimal& Vector3::operator[] (int index) const {
306  return (&x)[index];
307 }
308 
309 // Overloaded operator for addition
310 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 operator+(const Vector3& vector1, const Vector3& vector2) {
311  return Vector3(vector1.x + vector2.x, vector1.y + vector2.y, vector1.z + vector2.z);
312 }
313 
314 // Overloaded operator for substraction
315 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 operator-(const Vector3& vector1, const Vector3& vector2) {
316  return Vector3(vector1.x - vector2.x, vector1.y - vector2.y, vector1.z - vector2.z);
317 }
318 
319 // Overloaded operator for the negative of a vector
320 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 operator-(const Vector3& vector) {
321  return Vector3(-vector.x, -vector.y, -vector.z);
322 }
323 
324 // Overloaded operator for multiplication with a number
325 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 operator*(const Vector3& vector, decimal number) {
326  return Vector3(number * vector.x, number * vector.y, number * vector.z);
327 }
328 
329 // Overloaded operator for division by a number
330 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 operator/(const Vector3& vector, decimal number) {
331  assert(number > MACHINE_EPSILON);
332  return Vector3(vector.x / number, vector.y / number, vector.z / number);
333 }
334 
335 // Overload operator for division between two vectors
336 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 operator/(const Vector3& vector1, const Vector3& vector2) {
337  assert(vector2.x > MACHINE_EPSILON);
338  assert(vector2.y > MACHINE_EPSILON);
339  assert(vector2.z > MACHINE_EPSILON);
340  return Vector3(vector1.x / vector2.x, vector1.y / vector2.y, vector1.z / vector2.z);
341 }
342 
343 // Overloaded operator for multiplication with a number
344 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 operator*(decimal number, const Vector3& vector) {
345  return vector * number;
346 }
347 
348 // Overload operator for multiplication between two vectors
349 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 operator*(const Vector3& vector1, const Vector3& vector2) {
350  return Vector3(vector1.x * vector2.x, vector1.y * vector2.y, vector1.z * vector2.z);
351 }
352 
353 // Overloaded less than operator for ordering to be used inside std::set for instance
354 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool Vector3::operator<(const Vector3& vector) const {
355  return (x == vector.x ? (y == vector.y ? z < vector.z : y < vector.y) : x < vector.x);
356 }
357 
358 // Return a vector taking the minimum components of two vectors
359 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 Vector3::min(const Vector3& vector1, const Vector3& vector2) {
360  return Vector3(std::min(vector1.x, vector2.x),
361  std::min(vector1.y, vector2.y),
362  std::min(vector1.z, vector2.z));
363 }
364 
365 // Return a vector taking the maximum components of two vectors
366 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 Vector3::max(const Vector3& vector1, const Vector3& vector2) {
367  return Vector3(std::max(vector1.x, vector2.x),
368  std::max(vector1.y, vector2.y),
369  std::max(vector1.z, vector2.z));
370 }
371 
372 // Return the minimum value among the three components of a vector
373 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal Vector3::getMinValue() const {
374  return std::min(std::min(x, y), z);
375 }
376 
377 // Return the maximum value among the three components of a vector
378 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal Vector3::getMaxValue() const {
379  return std::max(std::max(x, y), z);
380 }
381 
382 // Get the string representation
383 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE std::string Vector3::to_string() const {
384  return "Vector3(" + std::to_string(x) + "," + std::to_string(y) + "," + std::to_string(z) + ")";
385 }
386 
387 // Return the zero vector
388 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 Vector3::zero() {
389  return Vector3(0, 0, 0);
390 }
391 
392 // Function to test if two vectors are (almost) equal
393 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE bool approxEqual(const Vector3& vec1, const Vector3& vec2, decimal epsilon = MACHINE_EPSILON) {
394  return approxEqual(vec1.x, vec2.x, epsilon) && approxEqual(vec1.y, vec2.y, epsilon) &&
395  approxEqual(vec1.z, vec2.z, epsilon);
396 }
397 
398 }
399 
400 #endif
